lead_paragraph: Gabriel Hjertstedt, Scott Gump and Daisuke Maruyama each shot a second consecutive five under 67 to tie for the second-round lead at the B.C. Open in Verona, N.Y. They are a shot ahead of David Branshaw.
snippet: Gabriel Hjertstedt, Scott Gump and Daisuke Maruyama each shot a second consecutive five under 67 to tie for the second-round lead at the B.C. Open in Verona, N.Y. They are a shot ahead of David Branshaw.
